name: my-study-spots
description: A web application to help students find open classrooms for studying

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv ../venv && source ../venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && python3 app.py

author: Ryan Rodriguez
